title: Chico: Brazilian Artist
overview: Chico Buarque is a constant presence in Brazil's art scene and makes up its citizen's popular culture. This wealth in music, poems, theater and novels has been created over the last 50 years and in this film Chico Buarque converses about his memories, shows, daily life, work methods, creative process, in summary all his trajectory. The musicianâ€™s search for his German brother, whom he never got to meet, serves as one of the axis for the narrative.
